article: Tom is busy but very happy on Sunday. He  gets up  at 6 in the morning.Then he brushes his teeth and goes out to run. He enjoys running. It makes him  feel  great. He runs back home  at about  :40 and has a bath. Then he eats a big breakfast. He has an egg, a hamburger, some bread and a bottle of juice  _  it. After breakfast he cleans  _  room and does his homework. At12:00, he has  _  with his parents. He eats a bowl of rice and some meat. He goes to the  _  after lunch. There he likes reading books about geography. He wants to learn more about  the world  In the evening his mother  _  dinner for him. After dinner, he likes to talk with his parents  _  his school life. Tom always enjoys his Sundays very much.
